## Description The image is a logo featuring the word "KÄRCHER" in bold, uppercase letters. The text is black and set against a bright yellow background. Below the text, there is a black horizontal bar that spans the width of the logo. The overall design is simple and uses high contrast colors to ensure visibility and brand recognition. ## K 4 CLASSIC CAR Leicht zu transportieren und schnell zu verstauen: der Hochdruckreiniger K 4 Classic Car, inkl. Teleskopgriff, für regelmäßige Einsätze bei mittelstarkem Schmutz sowie Car Kit. ## Description The image displays a pressure washer set, which includes several components: - **Main Unit**: A yellow and black pressure washer with wheels for mobility. It has a hose coiled around the front and a handle on top for easy transport. - **Spray Gun**: A black and yellow spray gun attachment for directing the water flow. - **Lance Attachments**: Two different lance attachments for varying spray patterns and intensities. - **Rotating Brush**: A brush attachment with a rotating head for scrubbing surfaces. - **Detergent Bottle**: A small bottle of detergent, likely for use with the pressure washer to enhance cleaning. - **Foam Nozzle**: An attachment for applying foam, useful for car washing or applying cleaning solutions. The set is designed for cleaning tasks such as washing vehicles, patios, and outdoor furniture. The components are laid out clearly, showcasing the versatility and functionality of the pressure washer. - Praktische Schlauch- und Zubehöraufbewahrung - Sehr kompaktes, leicht zu transportierendes und einfach zu verstauendes Reinigungsgerät - Integrierter Ansaugmechanismus für Reinigungsmittel ## Technische Daten
EAN-Code 4006825905291
Stromart Ph / V / Hz 1 / 220 - 240 / 50 - 60
Druck bar 20 - max. 130
Fördermenge l/h 420
Flächenleistung m²/h 30
Zulauftemperatur °C max. 40
Anschlussleistung W 1800
Anschlusskabel m 5
Farbe gelb
Gewicht ohne Zubehör kg 4,6
Gewicht inkl. Verpackung kg 8,2
Abmessungen (L × B × H) mm 264 × 256 × 450
## Ausstattung
Car Kit Rotierende Waschbürste, 0.3-1-Schaumdüse, Autoshampoo 3-in-1, 1 l
Hochdruckpistole G 120 Q
Vario Power Jet [x]
Dreckfräser [x]
HD-Schlauch m 6
Geräteseitiges Quick Connect [x]
Reinigungsmittelansatz über Ansaugschlauch
Teleskopgriff [ ]
Integrierter Wasserfilter [x]
Adapter Gartenschlauchanschluss A3/4" [x]
## Description The image is a logo for the "Guinness World Records." It features a circular emblem with the text "Guinness World Records" around the top and a star in the center. Below the emblem, there is a rectangular section with the text "Record Holder" in bold, capital letters. The color scheme includes blue, gold, and white. This logo signifies that the holder has achieved a record recognized by Guinness World Records. ## Description The image is a cropped section from a document, specifically a figure, featuring a bold and prominent design. It includes the following elements: - A large numeral "1" in a light gray color, serving as a background or watermark. - Overlaid on the numeral is a bright yellow arrow pointing to the right. - Inside the arrow, the text is displayed in a bold, black font: - "WORLD'S NO. 1" - "PRE-SLICE SANDWICH BRAND" The design suggests a focus on ranking or status, emphasizing the brand's position as a leading choice in its category. The use of bright colors and bold text is likely intended to capture attention and convey a sense of authority and trustworthiness. ## Description The image is a logo featuring the colors of the German flag: black, red, and yellow. The design is a stylized representation of the flag, with the colors arranged in a diagonal pattern. Below the flag, the text "Made in Germany" is displayed. The text is centered and uses a simple, sans-serif font. The overall design conveys the origin of a product, emphasizing its German manufacturing. ## Description The image is a graphical representation with a black background and yellow elements. It features a stylized icon that appears to depict a power plug or electrical symbol. Above the plug, there is a lightning bolt, suggesting electricity or power. Below the icon, there is text that reads "+100% POWER" in yellow. - **Icon**: The icon consists of a circular shape with a line extending from it, resembling a plug or electrical connector. A lightning bolt is positioned above the circle, indicating an increase or enhancement in power. - **Text**: The text "+100% POWER" is prominently displayed in yellow at the bottom of the image, indicating a full or enhanced power level. This figure likely represents a concept related to increased power or efficiency, possibly in a technical or electronic context. ## Description The image is a symbol or icon labeled "VARIO POWER." It features a stylized depiction of a pressure washer nozzle with an adjustable power setting. The nozzle is shown emitting a spray, and there is a plus sign (+) indicating an increase in power. The background is black, and the elements are in yellow, providing high contrast for visibility. This icon likely represents a feature on a pressure washer that allows the user to vary the power of the spray. ## Key-Value Pair Bestell-Nr.: 1 679-422.0 ## Description of the Figure The image is a cropped section from a document, specifically a figure. It contains a checkbox followed by text. The checkbox is empty, represented as `[ ]`. The text next to the checkbox reads: "Im Lieferumfang enthalten". This suggests that the checkbox is likely part of a list or form indicating whether certain items or features are included. In this case, the item or feature described by the text "Im Lieferumfang enthalten" is not selected or marked as included.

## Description

The image is a logo featuring the word "KÄRCHER" in bold, uppercase letters. The text is black and set against a bright yellow background. Below the text, there is a black horizontal bar that spans the width of the logo. The overall design is simple and uses high contrast colors to ensure visibility and brand recognition.

## K 4 CLASSIC CAR

Leicht zu transportieren und schnell zu verstauen: der Hochdruckreiniger K 4 Classic Car, inkl. Teleskopgriff, für regelmäßige Einsätze bei mittelstarkem Schmutz sowie Car Kit.

## Description

The image displays a pressure washer set, which includes several components:

- **Main Unit**: A yellow and black pressure washer with wheels for mobility. It has a hose coiled around the front and a handle on top for easy transport.
- **Spray Gun**: A black and yellow spray gun attachment for directing the water flow.
- **Lance Attachments**: Two different lance attachments for varying spray patterns and intensities.
- **Rotating Brush**: A brush attachment with a rotating head for scrubbing surfaces.
- **Detergent Bottle**: A small bottle of detergent, likely for use with the pressure washer to enhance cleaning.
- **Foam Nozzle**: An attachment for applying foam, useful for car washing or applying cleaning solutions.

The set is designed for cleaning tasks such as washing vehicles, patios, and outdoor furniture. The components are laid out clearly, showcasing the versatility and functionality of the pressure washer.

- Praktische Schlauch- und Zubehöraufbewahrung
- Sehr kompaktes, leicht zu transportierendes und einfach zu verstauendes Reinigungsgerät
- Integrierter Ansaugmechanismus für Reinigungsmittel

## Technische Daten
EAN-Code 4006825905291
Stromart Ph / V / Hz 1 / 220 - 240 / 50 - 60
Druck bar 20 - max. 130
Fördermenge l/h 420
Flächenleistung m²/h 30
Zulauftemperatur °C max. 40
Anschlussleistung W 1800
Anschlusskabel m 5
Farbe gelb
Gewicht ohne Zubehör kg 4,6
Gewicht inkl. Verpackung kg 8,2
Abmessungen (L × B × H) mm 264 × 256 × 450

## Ausstattung
Car Kit Rotierende Waschbürste, 0.3-1-Schaumdüse, Autoshampoo 3-in-1, 1 l
Hochdruckpistole G 120 Q
Vario Power Jet [x]
Dreckfräser [x]
HD-Schlauch m 6
Geräteseitiges Quick Connect [x]
Reinigungsmittelansatz über Ansaugschlauch
Teleskopgriff [ ]
Integrierter Wasserfilter [x]
Adapter Gartenschlauchanschluss A3/4" [x]

## Description

The image is a logo for the "Guinness World Records." It features a circular emblem with the text "Guinness World Records" around the top and a star in the center. Below the emblem, there is a rectangular section with the text "Record Holder" in bold, capital letters. The color scheme includes blue, gold, and white. This logo signifies that the holder has achieved a record recognized by Guinness World Records.

## Description

The image is a cropped section from a document, specifically a figure, featuring a bold and prominent design. It includes the following elements:

- A large numeral "1" in a light gray color, serving as a background or watermark.
- Overlaid on the numeral is a bright yellow arrow pointing to the right.
- Inside the arrow, the text is displayed in a bold, black font:
  - "WORLD'S NO. 1"
  - "PRE-SLICE SANDWICH BRAND"

The design suggests a focus on ranking or status, emphasizing the brand's position as a leading choice in its category. The use of bright colors and bold text is likely intended to capture attention and convey a sense of authority and trustworthiness.

## Description

The image is a logo featuring the colors of the German flag: black, red, and yellow. The design is a stylized representation of the flag, with the colors arranged in a diagonal pattern. Below the flag, the text "Made in Germany" is displayed. The text is centered and uses a simple, sans-serif font. The overall design conveys the origin of a product, emphasizing its German manufacturing.

## Description

The image is a graphical representation with a black background and yellow elements. It features a stylized icon that appears to depict a power plug or electrical symbol. Above the plug, there is a lightning bolt, suggesting electricity or power. Below the icon, there is text that reads "+100% POWER" in yellow.

- **Icon**: The icon consists of a circular shape with a line extending from it, resembling a plug or electrical connector. A lightning bolt is positioned above the circle, indicating an increase or enhancement in power.
- **Text**: The text "+100% POWER" is prominently displayed in yellow at the bottom of the image, indicating a full or enhanced power level.

This figure likely represents a concept related to increased power or efficiency, possibly in a technical or electronic context.

## Description

The image is a symbol or icon labeled "VARIO POWER." It features a stylized depiction of a pressure washer nozzle with an adjustable power setting. The nozzle is shown emitting a spray, and there is a plus sign (+) indicating an increase in power. The background is black, and the elements are in yellow, providing high contrast for visibility. This icon likely represents a feature on a pressure washer that allows the user to vary the power of the spray.

## Description of the Figure

The image is a cropped section from a document, specifically a figure. It contains a checkbox followed by text. The checkbox is empty, represented as `[ ]`. The text next to the checkbox reads: "Im Lieferumfang enthalten". 

This suggests that the checkbox is likely part of a list or form indicating whether certain items or features are included. In this case, the item or feature described by the text "Im Lieferumfang enthalten" is not selected or marked as included.
